title: Congratulations you beat me once.
body:
Miracles do happen, occasionally trolls prevail.

Make sure to talk big about that one time out of thousands of games you beat me at a video game and be sure to include insults and putdowns.

http://apollo-uploads-oce.s3.amazonaws.com/1436403770/cool-thanks-guy-thumb.jpg

0 f-cks given.

Killing you and teaching you a lesson are not mutually exclusive.

replies.body:
Yer in this kind of situation, the worst thing you can ever do is going around informing people about how successful he has trolled you. 

While your point stands but your delivery does make it seem like you have fallen for it.

Just ignore him.
To point out that there are 0 f-cks given about their trash talk whilst I do give a f-ck that they know that there are 0 f-cks given.
The amount of down syndrome you have is amazing.
The amount of 1 extra chromosome I have is amazing lol k.
